articles.title: Argentina, Brazil are 2022 World Cup favourites - Spain boss Luis Enrique - ESPN India
articles.description: Spain boss Luis Enrique has said he considers Argentina and Brazil the favourites heading into the 2022 World Cup in Qatar.
articles.content:
Spain manager Luis Enrique has said he considers Argentina and Brazil the favourites heading into the 2022 World Cup in Qatar.
